title: Battlecast Azir
body: I recently saw the Battlecast illaoi skin and that it is gonna be coming out in a while and the thoughts etc on it and I just thought of Azir and how dope a battlecast Azir skin would look like. I'm thinking robots as the soldiers who are black and red and have like electric looking spears and have azir looking black and red looking like a robot and also thinking about his q and e with a red trail coming from its back and the auto attack animation when hitting having a red splash look and the r looking like the soldier robots holding big red and black mech like shields. I just really thought this would be a cool skin and would look really dope in game, it just came to me now that it would look really sick in game. with a skin like Battlecast the theme being (red and black) which would look great on robot soldiers (azir w) and his r and Azir's character model itself.

replies.body:
Well, I cant really say no to more Azir skins <_<

Im not the hugest fan of battlecast as a skin line, yea its a classic, but its also pretty corny.
I wouldn't say no to a batttlecast Azir of course, but if I could choose a robotic one, personally id pick something a little more streamlined. More along the lines of this 'Age of Ultron' Azir:

https://how2play.pl/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/AVENGER-Azir.jpg

But I must admit, a battlecast Azir turret chugging out clouds of thick smog from multiple exhaust pipes would look damn cool!!

Azir has some pretty solid skins though, so i'm very thankful for that.

I do like all the azir skins at the moment and all I want is a robot like azir skin so this age of ultron azir skin is a good idea I don't care if it is battlecast or not I just want a cool looking robot skin for azir because the soldiers and turret and ult and azir's champ model itself would like pretty dope with it all being robotic like. But I guess I should've just stated in my writing and the title that I want a robotic skin for azir.
